heading: HR01901
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE NATIONAL TOBACCO ADMINISTRATION (NTA), THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (DA) AND THE NATIONAL ECONOMIC AND DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY (NEDA) TO CREATE AN INTER-AGENCY COUNCIL TO FORMULATE POLICIES, PROGRAMS AND PROJECTS THAT WILL SERVE AS SAFETY NETS FOR THE TOBACCO INDUSTRY FARMERS AND STAKEHOLDERS TO MITIGATE THE IMPACT OF THE INCREASES IN EXCISE TAXES ON TOBACCO PRODUCTS
status: Pending with the Committee on AGRICULTURE AND FOOD since 2018-05-29
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01901
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE NATIONAL TOBACCO ADMINISTRATION (NTA), THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (DA) AND THE NATIONAL ECONOMIC AND DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY (NEDA) TO CREATE AN INTER-AGENCY COUNCIL TO FORMULATE POLICIES, PROGRAMS AND PROJECTS THAT WILL SERVE AS SAFETY NETS FOR THE TOBACCO INDUSTRY FARMERS AND STAKEHOLDERS TO MITIGATE THE IMPACT OF THE INCREASES IN EXCISE TAXES ON TOBACCO PRODUCTS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SAVELLANO, DEOGRACIAS VICTOR B.
DATE FILED : 2018-05-23
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2018-05-29
